nodes.text: Star Wars: Rogue One Book and Model

Star Wars: Rogue One Book and Model is a canon children's activity set in the Star Wars Construction Books series based on the film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. The set includes an activity book and miniature U-wing paper model. It was written by Katrina Pallant and published by Egmont UK Ltd on December 16, 2016.
Insight Editions published an edition for the United States on October 6, 2020, titled Star Wars: Rogue One Book and Model Set.
